edited_stories.edited_story_text: I went downtown with friends for a show and dinner. The doorman had a fascinating leg tattoo, which helped illustrate the extravagant show to come. After the band we went to a Japanese restaurant with beautiful decor, including hanging lanterns. We had fun getting drunk until we encountered traffic in the streets on our way home.
